thread.title: Video of Melania recoiling from Trump’s touch has the Internet very concerned
thread.title_full: Video of Melania recoiling from Trump’s touch has the Internet very concerned

author: Graham Gremore
title: Video of Melania recoiling from Trump’s touch has the Internet very concerned
text:
By Graham Gremore 4 hours ago 
Everyone’s been talking about this clip of Melania Trump flinching at her husband’s touch as she was reciting the Lord’s Prayer during Donald’s 2020 campaign kickoff rally last weekend: Literally even the slightest touch by that garbage monster makes her flinch pic.twitter.com/iCLTRbKvdj 
— Jess Dweck (@TheDweck) February 19, 2017 

Related: Melania Trump is “miserable” as First Lady, hides inside $100 mil apartment most days, sources say 
Shortly after the video began circulating, the hashtag #FreeMelania started trending again as people tweeted their concerns for the distressed First Lady. 
Body language and communications expert Dr. Lillian Glass tells Elite Daily that Melania’s demeanor was likely caused by fear. 
“I find her to be extremely nervous and very uncomfortable in her role of First Lady,” Glass says. “She’s extremely tense, her voice shakes, it often cracks which shows a sign of muscle tension.” 
Glass continues: “Right when Donald Trump walked by, I noticed there was a shift in her demeanor. That’s showing disdain. He came up behind her, it was the touch on the shoulder and the shoulder shrugging to dismiss him.” 
Now, let’s take a look at the Internet’s response… 
First, there were the tweets… PRAYER WARRIOR ALERT: Melania Trump is now even using the Lord’s words to send coded messages for help! #FreeMelania pic.twitter.com/7HRf3ob5kn 
— Mrs. Betty Bowers (@BettyBowers) February 21, 2017 @TheDweck It's a warning squeeze. I'd venture to guess he doesn't like her getting more cheers than him. 
— Meg Bee (@oneretrocupcake) February 19, 2017 Literally even the slightest touch by that garbage monster makes her flinch pic.twitter.com/iCLTRbKvdj 
— Jess Dweck (@TheDweck) February 19, 2017 
And then came the memes… A post shared by Jimmy Monge (@thejimmyxavier) on Feb 22, 2017 at 8:48am PST A post shared by Tom Camilleri (@djsquirrelsuit) on Feb 16, 2017 at 10:52pm PST A post shared by Trump O'Shop (@trumposhop) on Feb 19, 2017 at 5:23pm PST A post shared by Obama Was A Real PRESIDENT (@blackpride_brownlove_) on Feb 23, 2017 at 5:58am PST A post shared by Save Melania Trump! (@savemelaniatrump) on Jan 25, 2017 at 6:41am PST A post shared by Xana Abreu ? (@xana_abreu) on Jan 25, 2017 at 5:37am PST 
Melania, if you’re reading, light a candle in the north tower if you need us to come rescue you.
